title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Quadern [Ashlars]", designed 1916–19
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount, lower right corner: Dessin: "Qiaderm"; Stamped in red, lower right corner: WIENER/WERK/STÄTTE; Inscribed in blue crayon on mount, upper right corner: 15.
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Repeating diamond shapes with leaf motif in middle and brown and purple daisy flower in between on turquoise background. Deckle edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design:  Quadern [Ashlars]", designed 1916–19.
designed 1916–19. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-1315.
